document_data.name: Azoun Obarskyr III
document_data.reckoning:
DR|parents = [[Palaghard Obarskyr II]]
[[Alendue Wyrvar]]|siblings = [[Lhannas Obarskyr]]
[[Salember Obarskyr]]|children = [[Rhigaerd Obarskyr II]]|dynasty = [[Obarskyr|Obarskyr Dynasty]]|start of reign = [[1261 DR]]|end of reign = [[1275 DR]]|predecessor = [[Salember Obarskyr|Salember the Rebel Prince]]|successor = [[Rhigaerd II]]}}
document_data.Relatives: Azoun III had two brothers, [[Lhannas Obarskyr|Lhannas]] and [[Salember]].
document_data.Death: Azoun died when his son [[Rhigaerd]] was only six years old.
